about.heading: About Me

about.bio_intro: My story doesn't start with code. It starts with the courage to change.

bakery.title: From the Bakery to Code
bakery.text: Before writing my first line of code, I already had 5 years of experience — behind a bakery counter. I started young, grew fast, and was promoted to manager of one of the franchises. But something inside me said that wasn't the final destination.

leap.title: The Leap of Faith
leap.text: I quit my stable job and moved to a small town in the countryside of Espírito Santo, Brazil. The plan? Have time to study during the week while working as a freelance waiter on weekends and holidays. No safety net — just determination.

first_try.title: The First Attempt
first_try.text: I started studying programming and quit after 1 week. I thought it was too hard for me. So I changed course: I took a flight attendant certification. My dream was to use my languages — fluent English, basic Japanese, and intermediate Italian — to see the world. The dream destination? Dubai, working for Emirates.

return.title: The Unexpected Return
return.text: Certified and ready to work as a flight attendant, something pulled me back. I decided to give programming one more chance — and this time, I fell in love. I dove in headfirst and never looked back.

rise.title: From LinkedIn to First Job
rise.text: I started sharing my study journey on LinkedIn, helping others who were in the same situation. The posts gained visibility, and within a few months I landed my first fully remote job at a startup.

destiny.title: Purpose, Not Irony
destiny.text: Promoted in 6 months. Passed a selection process for Dubai before even completing 11 months of career. The country I always dreamed of working in as a flight attendant — was now my destination as a developer. Irony of fate? I don't think so. I think it was purpose.

present.title: And Now?
present.text: Here I am today. Continuously evolving and standing out in my field, serving international clients and delivering high-quality projects. Ready to learn and grow even more.

opensource.title: Open Source & Recognition
opensource.description: Joined the SouJunior open source project and stood out among the developers. My LinkedIn posts about deliveries gained visibility and opened doors.

first_job.title: First Job
first_job.description: Landed my first remote job as a Junior Developer at Dopster, a startup where I dove headfirst into the modern web ecosystem.

tech_lead.title: Tech Lead at 6 Months
tech_lead.description: Promoted to tech lead and considered mid-level in just 6 months. Started working with React Native, React, and Next.js across multiple projects.

dubai_hire.title: Hired by Dubai
dubai_hire.description: Passed the selection process as a web developer for a Dubai-based company. In less than 1 year of career, I was already working in the international market.

dubai_mission.title: Dubai Mission
dubai_mission.description: Called as a crucial piece to work on-site in Dubai from December 4th to 24th. Together with the local team and another Brazilian dev, delivered a new backoffice version — migrating from legacy Angular to React and Next.js with multitenant architecture — in record time. Returned with mission accomplished and a raise.

europe.title: European Clients
europe.description: Expanded my reach to the European market, landing clients in Portugal and across Europe. Delivering high-quality freelance projects for companies that demand excellence and punctuality.

photo_gallery.heading: My Journey Through Code
photo_gallery.subtitle: How programming took me from Brazil to the other side of the world

gold-gate.alt: At the Gold Gate in Dubai
gold-gate.caption: The Golden Welcome
gold-gate.story: First day in Dubai. Walking through the iconic Gold Gate, everything felt surreal — 11 months ago I was writing my first lines of code in Brazil, and now I was stepping into a new world.

desert-eagle.caption: Wings of Freedom
desert-eagle.story: In the Arabian desert, I met this magnificent eagle. A perfect symbol of what programming gave me: the freedom to fly beyond borders and reach places I never imagined.

desert.caption: The Endless Horizon
desert.story: The vastness of the Arabian desert reminded me that no limit is real. From a small city in Brazil to the dunes of the Middle East — all through the power of code.

sharjah-desert.caption: Beyond Comfort Zones
sharjah-desert.story: Exploring Sharjah's desert on my day off. Every new experience abroad reinforced my belief: when you invest in your skills, the world opens its doors.

burj-video.caption: Touching the Sky
burj-video.story: Standing before the tallest building in the world, filming this moment. Less than a year in tech and I was here — living proof that dedication and code can take you anywhere.

burj-selfie.alt: In front of the Burj Khalifa
burj-selfie.caption: Dream Realized
burj-selfie.story: The classic Burj Khalifa selfie. This wasn't just tourism — I was here because a Dubai company recognized my work and flew me in to deliver a critical project.

marina-wheel.caption: On Top of the World
marina-wheel.story: Ain Dubai, the world's largest ferris wheel. From up there, looking at the Marina skyline, I reflected on how far I'd come — and how much further I wanted to go.

dubai-group.caption: The Team That Made It Happen
dubai-group.story: With the team after delivering the new backoffice version. We migrated from legacy Angular to React and Next.js with multitenant architecture — in record time. Mission accomplished.

burj-close.caption: Until Next Time
burj-close.story: One last look at the Burj Khalifa before heading back to Brazil. I returned with a raise, new connections, and the certainty that this was just the beginning of my international journey.
